title: 服务器怎么开放飞行权限和tp权限
author: tmzwoerzi
txt_content: 服务器用的是luckperms 插件 怎么给普通玩家飞行和tp的权限啊

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
tmzwoerzi 发表于 2020-3-1 16:13
是整个服务器开放
lp group 玩家组 permission set essentials.fly
lp group 玩家组 permission set essentials.tp

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
lp user 玩家ID permission set essentials.fly
lp user 玩家ID permission set essentials.tp

只给指定的玩家对吧

replies.author: tmzwoerzi
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-3-1 16:08
lp user 玩家ID permission set essentials.fly
lp user 玩家ID permission set essentials.tp
是整个服务器开放

replies.author: tmzwoerzi
replies.txt_content:
折叠 发表于 2020-3-1 16:14
lp group 玩家组 permission set essentials.fly
lp group 玩家组 permission set essentials.tp
怎么列出来玩家在的组呢 我是真看不懂

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
tmzwoerzi 发表于 2020-3-1 16:17
怎么列出来玩家在的组呢 我是真看不懂
一般玩家是在default组

replies.author: 肆火
replies.txt_content: 在Ess权限组里，把默认组加上essentials.fly 和essentials.tp
